front.title: Framework for IP Multicast in MPLS

abstract.t: This document offers a framework for IP multicast deployment in anMPLS environment. Issues arising when MPLS techniques are applied toIP multicast are overviewed. The pros and cons of existing IPmulticast routing protocols in the context of MPLS are described andthe relation to the different trigger methods and LDP modes arediscussed. The consequences of various layer 2 (L2) technologies arelisted. Both point-to-point and multi-access networks areconsidered.
